scripts.start-all: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "LB,User-1,User-2,User-3,wallet-1,wallet-2,wallet-3 " -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,red.bold,blue.bold,green.bold,cyan.bold,red.bold,blue.bold,green.bold" "nodemon LB/index.js" "nodemon user-1/index.js" "nodemon user-2/index.js" "nodemon user-3/index.js" "nodemon wallet-1/index.js" "nodemon wallet-2/index.js" "nodemon wallet-3/index.js"
